title: cli工具
content:
cli
==

## 第三方库
- babel-cli/babel-env: 语法转换
- commander: 命令行工具
- download-git-repo: 用来下载远程模板
- ini: 格式转换
- inquirer: 交互式命令行工具
- ora: 显示loading动画
- chalk: 修改控制台输出内容样式
- log-symbols: 显示出 √ 或 × 等的图标

## `init`
```zsh
$ mkdir wuw-cli && cd wuw-cli
$ npm init --yes
$ npm install babel-cli babel-env chalk commander download-git-repo ini inquirer log-symbols ora
```

## 目录
```
├── bin
│   └── www            //可执行文件
├── dist
|    ├── ...           //生成文件
└── src
    ├── ...
└── app.js             //入口文件
├── package.json
├── README.md
```

### `package.json`

```json
{
  "name": "app",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "compile": "babel src -d dist",
    "watch": "npm run compile -- --watch"
  },
  "bin": {
    "wuw": "./bin/www"    // bin 配置
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "dependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-env": "^2.4.1",
    "chalk": "^4.1.0",
    "commander": "^6.2.0",
    "download-git-repo": "^3.0.2",
    "ini": "^1.3.5",
    "inquirer": "^7.3.3",
    "log-symbols": "^4.0.0",
    "ora": "^5.1.0"
  }
}
```

### `bin`
> 行首加入一行 #!/usr/bin/env node 指定当前脚本由node.js进行解析

```shell
// /bin/www
#! /usr/bin/env node
require('../dist/main.js');
```

- `npm link` 将`wuw`命令链接到全局
